price: Hapo mbingu zitapasuka! Ahadi yake itakuwa imetekelezwa.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا
footnotes: Mbingu juu ya nguvu zake na ukubwa wake, Siku hiyo zitapasukilia mbali kwa shida zake na vitisho vyake. Na ahadi ya Mwenyezi Mungu ni lazima itokee, hapana hivi wala hivi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
